diffs.old_value: All Astral spells recharge faster.
All damage dealt is increased against targets below half health.
diffs.new_value: All damage dealt is increased by 47% against targets below half health.

diffs.old_value: Allied creatures near the Fire Elementalist capture Altar faster.
diffs.new_value: Allied creatures near the Fire Elementalist capture Altar +58% faster.

diffs.old_value: Damaging burning enemies heals the Fire Elementalist.
diffs.new_value: Damaging burning enemies heals the Fire Elementalist for 10 Health.

diffs.old_value: Increases Rank III population, reduces Rank II population.
diffs.new_value: Increases Rank III population by 1, reduces Rank II population by 2.

diffs.old_value: All Holy incantations recharge faster.
Mark the ground with a massive healing seal.
diffs.new_value: Mark the ground with a massive healing seal (70 + 1.37% target Max HP).

diffs.old_value: Increases Rank II and Rank III population while reducing Rank I population.
diffs.new_value: Increases Rank II population by 5 and Rank III population by 1 while reducing Rank I population by 15.

diffs.old_value: While on the ground, the Shaman recharges Wild spells and creatures much faster.
diffs.new_value: While on the ground, the Shaman recharges Wild spells and creatures +58% faster.

diffs.old_value: The Swamp Witch has more Rank I population, but less Rank II and Rank III population.
diffs.new_value: The Swamp Witch increases Rank I population by 5, while reducing Rank II and Rank III population by 2.

diffs.old_value: Unleashes a demonic form that boosts all spell damage by 150%. Poison Strike fires 2 extra projectiles that deal +285% damage.
diffs.new_value: Unleashes a demonic form that boosts all spell damage by +50%. Poison Strike fires 2 extra projectiles that deal +185% damage.

diffs.old_value: Poison Strike gains 2 extra projectiles dealing +285% damage.
diffs.new_value: Poison Strike gains 2 extra projectiles dealing +185% damage.

allied_effect.description: Increases damage dealt by infused allies.

enemy_effect.description: Applies buildup of Burning status on enemies, dealing damage over time.

allied_effect.description: Increases movement speed of infused allies.

enemy_effect.description: Applies buildup of a chain lightning attack on enemies, dealing damage.

allied_effect.description: Grants health regeneration to infused allies.

enemy_effect.description: Applies buildup of Poison on enemies, dealing damage over time based on max HP.

allied_effect.description: Increases damage resistance of infused allies.

enemy_effect.description: Applies buildup of Freeze on enemies, slowing and eventually freezing them.

aura.name: AoE Heal
aura.description: Heals allies in the targeted area.

diffs.new_value: Piercing arrow that damages enemies and heals allies.
Focused beam that deals sustained Frost damage.
Ritual that transforms Rank I creatures into harmless critters.
Focused beam that deals low Poison damage.

new_value.description: Gaia Beast takes extra damage on its chest.
Thanatos takes extra damage from behind.

aura.name: Cursed Wounds (Slow)
aura.description: Reduces movement speed of nearby enemies by 60%. Lingers for 1s.

aura.name: Cursed Wounds (Vulnerability)
aura.description: Increases damage taken by nearby enemies by 32%. Lingers for 1s.

diffs.new_value: Mounted unit that charges and destroys enemy structures.
Factory that continuously produces Rocket Soldiers.
Disruptive creature that makes enemies fight each other.
Small Recharge. Restores 5 Energy (5x Rank I, 1x Rank II).
Medium Recharge. Restores 15 Energy (15x Rank I, 3x Rank II, 1x Rank III).
Captures an enemy territory and refill all charges.
Light Heal. Restores 25 Health to the Spellcaster.
Medium Heal. Restores 75 Health to the Spellcaster.
Major Heal. Restores 150 Health to the Spellcaster.
